name: Uralis
declaringWar: Your cities are a shadow of what could be...
attacked: You can decleare war all you want, it means nothing to us!
defeated: The Golden Capital has fallen! What dark days...
introduction: Hello! Welcome to the Golden Capital of the world, Would you like to join us?
tradeRequest: Hey, Would you like some riches?

name: Urun-Dor
defeated: Before i go, please take care of my dogs.
introduction: Greetings! I am Harren! Leader of the great Urun-Dor
tradeRequest: Hey, Could i have some things please?
uniques: [+2 Production] from all [Culture] buildings <while the empire is happy>

name: The Empire
declaringWar: I never wanted this to happen! But war is needed
attacked: Really? you must be a brave person...
introduction: Greetings, I am Gabriel, the leader of this here empire.
uniques: When defeating a [Wounded] unit, earn [30] Gold and recruit it

name: VividVale
declaringWar: I'm sorry, but you threaten the peace and balance of this world.
attacked: Look at that leader with war declaration, nice job, mate. Show how evil you are!
defeated: VividVale has collapsed, we will respect you if you respect us...
introduction: Welcome! We are VividVale and we hope for many allies.

name: Costazmacia
declaringWar: One day, Humanity will be united again. But you're in my way...
attacked: War..? I never wanted to make you fall.
defeated: Costazmacia has fallen, Humanity will be united one day... It's a shame it won't be our Monarchy.
introduction: Hey! It's cold outside, how about you come inside and talk about you're people to me.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Food] per [5] population [in all cities] <with [Fish]>

name: Alihn Ahn
startIntroPart1: Alihn Ahn is a nation known for it's instesity of it's riches, and for their love of it, begining on the desert, is where their new story begins
startIntroPart2: Will you leade Alihn Ahn to riches, Can you build a civilisation that can stand against the test of time?
declaringWar: I've had enough of looking at your poor cities!
attacked: Why should this be!? Our riches will blind you!
defeated: Hmm! What now? want to laugh as you bring everything away..?
introduction: Oh hello!, Have you come to my shining cities for guidance?
tradeRequest: I have waited ages to ask you this!!
uniques: May buy [All] units with [Gold] [in all cities]

name: Fortoulen
startIntroPart1: Fortoulen, The great and mysterious north, filled with beautiful jungles and forest. Many no not of the bloodshed between the other southern tribes and empires. but with your mind, Loneltili, Fortoulen shall thrive
startIntroPart2: Oh Loneltili, can you defend against the southern empires? Can you build a civilisation that can stand against the test of time?
declaringWar: War is the only way we can have peace, accept our pain!
attacked: We are not strangers to war, you have failed to think. Now we shall turn your men around...
defeated: I should have known to leave you alone, and now, i'm an alone wanderer.
introduction: Hello Wanderer! We come from far and wide to greet you to our society, for we are Fortoulen!
tradeRequest: We want to know abou you, friend, for we are a keen society

name: Grendale
startIntroPart1: Vast lush land... This is a sign that Grenland is here. Grendale, starting off as a colony that came from south Costi rose to the top for it's fertile home. Grendale also allowed independance for VividVale, which eventually made Grendale unpopular and 'Uncultured', but who can save Grendale from this? And this is where Edmerl came in to power
startIntroPart2: Will you bring Grendale back to the spotlight? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your intent for violence has forced us to go to war!
attacked: Grendale will not surrender to you, no matter how hard you try!
defeated: All i wanted to do was bring Grendale strength, now Grendale will be forgotten
introduction: Hello and welcome to Grenland! And I am Edmerl, President of the cultured Grenland
tradeRequest: As president Edmerl, I Suggest a humble delegation

name: A'Arya
declaringWar: Our people will never bow down to you!
attacked: When will people leave is alone..?
defeated: This isn't victory, this is enslavement...

name: Ceylihn
declaringWar: All you do is take, it's my turn to take!
defeated: My people will not stand for this!
